short_summary: Service to provide Aircraft Charter Services on 18th of July 2024.
description: This is a service procurement for Aircraft Charter Services, all supporting documentation and submissions must be  submitted by 14:00 EST on the 18th of July 2024.
tags: A contract from the government of Canada Competitive bid only
full_summary:
=================================
### Aircraft Charter Services Tender Announcement

**Contract Reference:** WS3753315787-Doc4612221187

**Closing Date:** Thursday, July 18, 2024 at 14:00 EST

**Publication Date:** Thursday, May 30, 2024

**Tender Category:** Service Procurement (SRV)

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bids for Aircraft Charter Services. The selected contractor will be responsible for providing charter services for the movement of freight and personnel on behalf of the Government of Canada.

**Solicitation Details:**

* **Standard Form of Agreement:** Request for Standing Offer ( Demande d'offre à commandes )
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** None
* **Regions of Delivery:** Canada

**Bid Submission Requirements:**

* All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received by Thursday, July 18, 2024 at 14:00 EST.
* Bids received after the closing time will be deemed non-responsive.

**Contact Information:**

* Name: Kingsley Glover (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: kingsley.glover@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19870458?extsite=MTk4NzA0NThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Important Notices:**

* Please note that the closing time for this solicitation has been amended. The Ariba Discovery posting response deadline and the CanadaBuys posting closing time should be disregarded. All bid submissions must be received by the specified closing date.

**Tags:**

* UNSPSC Code: 78142001
* UNSPSC Description: Rental of Freight Aircraft with Operator
* Procurement Category: Service (SRV)
